column4: Hey everyone.  I'm just switching from gentoo to ubuntu, and would like to know if ubuntu has an equivalent to gentoo's USE feature for emerge.  is there something akin to the USE flag on ubuntu's apt-get (taken from debian)
and tiredwolf.  thank you for your quick reply.
that doesn't mean you can't build source packages on your own, though (although the priority systems makes it annoying, as the system always tends to prefer official packages over the ones you built)
